KCBlogs.title: Cotton mealy bug
KCBlogs.body: I have a severe issue of mealy bug. Suggest me the best possible solution for the same. I would be greatful to you for helping me. I am new at farming. I have grown 50 acres of cotton. The seed I used was Ajeet 155.
KCBlogs.author: Parva Shaileshkumar Patel
